item.source: How could i change the Client name on top ? (Read More)

item.title: How could i change the Client name on top ? (Read More)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

To change the compiler Title click edit on it and look for the title. For the client Go in Gui.Java and look twords the bottom.

Example for Client name changing:

Example for Compiler name changing:

@echo off Title Compiler cd Client Files if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
The text after Title is the title of the compiler.

Read full topic
